text: Chithrakaran Murali (Murali T) is an artist from Kerala, India. One of his works is based on the life and struggle of Nangeli, a brave woman who fought against caste system deprivation. The work of Murali has been recognised by news media including the BBC. == See also == * Channar revolt * Kannagi ==References== Category:Living people Category:Painters from Kerala Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Chithrakaran Murali
